name: Pick It!
description:
Pick It! is a relaxing intriguing clicking game made in 4 days. The icon above all the inventory slots shows you what to click. If the algorithm chooses the item you have to click to be the same item twice, you will get two times more XP. If you level up, your clicks are reduced by 20%.

There are 25 items to unlock, but only 24 slots. It's up to you to figure out why that is.

WARNING: THE GAME DOES NOT SAVE ITSELF. IF YOU EXIT THE GAME, ALL YOUR PROGRESS WILL BE LOST.
